description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
duration_in_months: The contract duration can vary from 3 to 15 months.
full_summary:
### Tender Notice for Bussplug and Electrical Connector

**Tender Reference:** W8482-241882/A
**Tender Title:** BACKSHELL, ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR
**Contracting Authority:** National Defence (DND)

**Summary:**

National Defence (DND) invites bidders to submit proposals for the supply and delivery of BACKSHELL, ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR items to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia, and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia. The tender notice details the requirements for six (6) items, with a total quantity of 923 pieces. Bidders are required to submit their proposals in Canadian dollars.

**Requirements:**

- BACKSHELL, ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR, Part No.: KDM001-25CA2J, NCAGE 50619 R. KERN ENGINEERING & MANUFACTURING CORP. (Quantity: 255 units to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia)
- BACKSHELL, ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR, Part No.: KDM001-25CA2J, NCAGE 50619 R. KERN ENGINEERING & MANUFACTURING CORP. (Quantity: 183 units to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia)
- BACKSHELL, ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR, Part No.: KDM004-15C05D4JP, NCAGE 50619 R. KERN ENGINEERING & MANUFACTURING CORP. (Quantity: 227 units to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia)
- BACKSHELL, ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR, Part No.: KDM004-15C05D4JP, NCAGE 50619 R. KERN ENGINEERING & MANUFACTURING CORP. (Quantity: 163 units to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia)
- BACKSHELL, ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR, Part No.: K3118-15C05D5W, NCAGE 50619 R. KERN ENGINEERING & MANUFACTURING CORP. (Quantity: 114 units to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia)
- BACKSHELL, ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR, Part No.: K3118-15C05D5W, NCAGE 50619 R. KERN ENGINEERING & MANUFACTURING CORP. (Quantity: 82 units to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia)

**Bidder Requirements:**

- Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name, model, part number,
